title: bigbet778
author: bigbet778
content: Hello everyone ,I’m offering VIP BETTING SERVICE !If you have fixed bets, inside info I can bet it for you. I’m offering VIP accounts in the bookmakers , I can bet in Asia, I can bet for you on local shops. Information from you , money and accounts from me. You will receive your part of the deal in the way you want. 50% of the winnings you get. Only serious players please without time wasters !Contact me on Telegram : @bigbet778t.me/bigbet778

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: There are no people here that actually have games like this, trust me.It's all story tellers and scammers.Your offer makes you likely to get scammed.Or maybe your offer is a scam attempt as well, how can people know you actually share the profits. My opinion is that it goes in a different direction which I don't dive deeper into.

comments.author: bnbstorm
